summary: This is a legal motion filed by Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team requesting severance and separate trial for Counts Five and Six of the superseding indictment. The document is a formal notice of motion submitted to the United States District Court for the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in the criminal case who is moving for severance of Counts Five and Six of the superseding indictment.

persons.name: Jeffrey S. Pagliuca
persons.context: Attorney representing Ghislaine Maxwell who signed and submitted the motion on behalf of the defense team.

persons.name: Laura A. Menninger
persons.context: Attorney listed as part of Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team from Haddon, Morgan & Foreman P.C.

persons.name: Mark S. Cohen
persons.context: Attorney listed as part of Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team from Cohen & Gresser LLP.

persons.name: Christian R. Everdell
persons.context: Attorney listed as part of Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team from Cohen & Gresser LLP.

persons.name: Bobbi C. Stemheim
persons.context: Attorney listed as part of Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team from the Law Offices of Bobbi C. Stemheim.

events.title: Motion for Severance Filed
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team files a motion requesting severance and separate trial for Counts Five and Six of the superseding indictment.

locations: United States District Court Southern District of New York
33 West 19th Street - 4th Floor, New York, NY
keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team filed a motion to sever Counts Five and Six from the rest of the superseding indictment.
The motion was filed on January 25, 2021, indicating ongoing pretrial proceedings in Maxwell's criminal case.
Maxwell was represented by a substantial legal team from multiple law firms across different states.
The document shows Maxwell's defense was actively challenging the structure of the indictment against her.
This is Pretrial Motion #5 in the case numbered 20 Cr. 330 (MN).
